subdialogue_text: Please, grant me death. Undo my shackles.
Ohh...
Ohh, then it's true...
A Champion of Ash, as I live and breathe.
To be in your presence is a great honour.
I am Yoel of Londor, a pilgrim, as you can see, only...
Somehow, I've failed to die as was ordained.
Well, perhaps my calling lies elsewhere.

Say, Champion of Ash,
how does the idea of taking me into your service strike you?
I was once a sorcerer. Surely I can be of use.
Ahh, mm, yes, of course.
An accursed pilgrim has no place in your honourable service.
But if a lost soul should encounter a legend such as you,
could that be anything but a movement of fate?
I will remain in this spot.
Praying solemnly that you might have a change of heart.

behavior: #0After choosing "Decline" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: Ahh, Champion of Ash. Have you had a change of heart?

behavior: #0After choosing "Decline" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: I beg of you, take me into your service.

behavior: #0Choose "Accept his service" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: Ohh, I am honoured, truly.

behavior: #0Choose "Accept his service" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: I should be dead, yet you have granted me purpose anew.

behavior: #0Choose "Accept his service" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: I, Yoel of Londor, do solemnly swear myself to you.
What's come over you!
Killing Undead for sport, accursed champion?
Oh, our Champion of Ash, welcome home.

This pilgrim, with a debt in death,
hardly deserves to behold this divine flame.
And I never would have, had you not taken me into your service.
I thank you dearly for this... And assure you of my leal service.
Oh, our Champion of Ash. Welcome back.
By all means, tell me what you desire.
Oh, our Champion of Ash. Welcome back.
I would do anything for my master, just say the word.
As I have said, I was once a sorcerer.

Alas, the magic of Londor is a far cry
from the wonders of Vinheim.
But I can teach you what I know.
Perhaps more importantly...
I believe that I can help tease out your true strength.
We pilgrims of Londor are keenly aware.

That those branded by the Darksign
possess something quite special...

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Draw Out True Strength" before attaining 5 Dark Sigils
subdialogue_text: Then, shall we begin?

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Draw Out True Strength" before attaining 5 Dark Sigils
subdialogue_text: Bearer of the Darksign, let your true strength shine...

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Draw Out True Strength" after attaining 5 Dark Sigils
subdialogue_text: Ahh, you have attained ample strength.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Draw Out True Strength" after attaining 5 Dark Sigils
subdialogue_text: All will soon be clear, my good Lord...
Be safe, Champion of Ash.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Leave" or after leaving abruptly, after attaining 5 Dark Sigils
subdialogue_text: Be safe, our Lord...
What do you intend?
Lady Yuria...
Ahh, I thank you kindly...
Our kindest Lord...
##And a fool's sport it is...
##Champion of ash, what have you done?
